co.cask.cdap.api.worker

Interface WorkerConfigurer


  • public interface WorkerConfigurer
    Interface for configuring Worker.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setDescription(String description)
      Set description of the Worker.
      void setInstances(int instances)
      Sets the number of instances needed for the Worker.
      void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the Worker.
      void setProperties(Map<String,String> properties)
      Sets a set of properties that will be available through the WorkerSpecification.getProperties() at runtime.
      void setResources(Resources resources)
      Sets the resources requirements for the the Worker.
      void useDatasets(Iterable<String> datasets)
      Deprecated. 
      datasets being used during runtime need not be specified in Worker.configure(co.cask.cdap.api.worker.WorkerConfigurer)

    • Method Detail

      • setName

        void setName(String name)
        Sets the name of the Worker.

      • setDescription

        void setDescription(String description)
        Set description of the Worker.
        Parameters:
        description - the description

      • setResources

        void setResources(Resources resources)
        Sets the resources requirements for the the Worker.
        Parameters:
        resources - the requirements

      • setInstances

        void setInstances(int instances)
        Sets the number of instances needed for the Worker.
        Parameters:
        instances - number of instances, must be > 0

      • setProperties

        void setProperties(Map<String,String> properties)
        Sets a set of properties that will be available through the WorkerSpecification.getProperties() at runtime.
        Parameters:
        properties - the properties to set

      • useDatasets

        @Deprecated
void useDatasets(Iterable<String> datasets)
        Deprecated. datasets being used during runtime need not be specified in Worker.configure(co.cask.cdap.api.worker.WorkerConfigurer)
        Adds the names of Datasets used by the worker.
        Parameters:
        datasets - dataset names
